title: Can't post .. ?
body:
I'm level 15 and it says I'm level 1 on the forums when I check my profile.

It keeps saying I can't post because I need to be level 6 or higher, do I need to wait for it to update or what? I've been past level 6 for a day now.

replies.body:
Sometimes if you haven't used the boards in quite some time, your Summoner and Boards profiles will fall out of sync. It seems this discussion post has synced them, since you now show as level 15.

Happy posting!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tsZkhoEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-02T23:15:04.832+0000)
>
> Sometimes if you haven't used the boards in quite some time, your Summoner and Boards profiles will fall out of sync. It seems this discussion post has synced them, since you now show as level 15.
> 
> Happy posting!

My PBE account is still bugged to a null summoner name and can't post, and baconhawk said she'd fix it like 6 months ago.
